content:
who am I

你们好! 我是August,一名软工在校学生😋，正逐步入门丰富多彩的programming世界，希望将自己的个人经验、学习所得分享出来，欢迎大家批评指正！<(￣︶￣)↗[GO!]

Hello everyone! I’m August, a software engineering student 😋, gradually stepping into the vibrant world of programming.

I hope to share my personal experiences and what I’ve learned along the way.

Your critiques and advice are most welcome! ヾ(≧▽≦*)o

☆*: .｡. o(≧▽≦)o .｡.:*☆ mail : 1107639166@qq.com
